trans-unit.source: Defines an activity-qualified location that corresponds to a user event in the potential execution path of a root workflow instance.
trans-unit.target: 루트 워크플로 인스턴스의 잠재적 실행 경로에 있는 사용자 이벤트에 해당 하는 활동 정규화 된 위치를 정의 합니다.

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: 이 클래스는 상속 될 수 없습니다.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] An activity designer or a workflow designer may use any of the overloaded <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity.TrackData%2A?displayProperty=fullName> and <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionContext.TrackData%2A?displayProperty=fullName> methods to instrument the workflow to emit data to the runtime tracking infrastructure as a user event.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]활동 디자이너나 워크플로 디자이너를 사용할 수는 오버 로드 된 <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity.TrackData%2A?displayProperty=fullName>및 <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionContext.TrackData%2A?displayProperty=fullName>런타임 추적 인프라가 사용자 이벤트로 데이터를 내보낼 워크플로를 계측 하는 방법.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionContext.TrackData%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity.TrackData%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The data emitted is referred to as user data.
trans-unit.target: 내보낸 데이터를 사용자 데이터 라고 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Unlike activity status events, and workflow status events, which occur only on activity or workflow status changes, user events can occur at any location that is instrumented in a workflow.
trans-unit.target: 활동 상태 이벤트 및 활동 또는 워크플로 상태가 변경 될 경우에 발생 하는 워크플로 상태 이벤트와 달리 사용자 이벤트는 워크플로에서 계측 되는 모든 위치에서 발생할 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: A UserTrackingLocation defines the matching parameters for such a location by specifying the type of the user data, the type of the activity from which it must be emitted, a collection of conditions that can more precisely qualify an instance or instances of this activity, an optional key name with which the user data must be associated, whether derived types of the user data should be matched, and whether user data emitted from activities derived from the type of the specified activity should be matched.
trans-unit.target: 형식 사용자 데이터의 형식을 지정 하 여 해당 위치에 대 한 일치 하는 매개 변수를 정의 하는 한 UserTrackingLocation 올 것 내보내야, 인스턴스 또는 선택적 키 이름 된 사용자 데이터 연결, 해야이 활동의 인스턴스를 보다 정확 하 게 정규화 할 수 있는 조건 컬렉션을 활동의 여부 사용자 데이터의 파생된 형식을 일치 해야 합니다. 및 여부 지정된 된 활동 형식에서 파생 된 활동에서 내보낸 사용자 데이터는 일치 해야 합니다.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > A single UserTrackingLocation may refer to more than one actual location in the potential execution path of a workflow instance.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > 단일 UserTrackingLocation 워크플로 인스턴스의 잠재적 실행 경로 있는 둘 이상의 실제 위치를 참조할 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: You may add a UserTrackingLocation to either <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackPoint.MatchingLocations%2A?displayProperty=fullName> or <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackPoint.ExcludedLocations%2A?displayProperty=fullName> in order to define the match parameters for a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackPoint> in a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile>.
trans-unit.target: 중 하나 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackPoint.MatchingLocations%2A?displayProperty=fullName>또는 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackPoint.ExcludedLocations%2A?displayProperty=fullName> <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackPoint> <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile>.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile> 에</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackPoint> 대 한 일치 매개 변수를 정의 하기 위해</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackPoint.ExcludedLocations%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackPoint.MatchingLocations%2A?displayProperty=fullName> 에 UserTrackingLocation를 추가할 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: There are three general conditions which must be met in the following order for the UserTrackingLocation to be matched by the runtime tracking infrastructure: the activity that has emitted a user event must match the set of activities specified by <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.ActivityType%2A>, <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.ActivityTypeName%2A>, <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.Conditions%2A>, and <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.MatchDerivedActivityTypes%2A>; the key, if one exists, associated with the user data must match <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.KeyName%2A>; and, the type of the user data emitted by the user event must match the set of user data types specified by <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.ArgumentType%2A>, <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.ArgumentTypeName%2A>, and <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.MatchDerivedArgumentTypes%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 없는 세 가지 일반적인 런타임 추적 인프라가 일치 시킬 UserTrackingLocation에 대 한 다음과 같은 순서로 충족 해야 함: 사용자 이벤트를 발생 시킨가 활동 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.ActivityType%2A>, 지정 된 작업 집합이 같아야 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.ActivityTypeName%2A>, <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.Conditions%2A>, 및 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.MatchDerivedActivityTypes%2A>; 한 경우 키가 있는 연결 된 데이터가 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.KeyName%2A>; 사용자와 일치 해야 하 고 사용자 이벤트에 의해 내보낸 사용자 데이터 유형의 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.ArgumentType%2A>로 지정 된 사용자 데이터 형식 집합이 같아야 합니다. , <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.ArgumentTypeName%2A>, and <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.MatchDerivedArgumentTypes%2A>.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.MatchDerivedArgumentTypes%2A></xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.ArgumentTypeName%2A></xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.ArgumentType%2A></xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.KeyName%2A></xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.MatchDerivedActivityTypes%2A></xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.Conditions%2A></xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.ActivityTypeName%2A></xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.ActivityType%2A>

trans-unit.source: Only if all three of these conditions are met, does the runtime tracking infrastructure consider the UserTrackingLocation matched.
trans-unit.target: 에서는 세 가지 이러한 조건이 모두 충족 되는 경우에 런타임 추적 인프라가 고려 일치 UserTrackingLocation.

trans-unit.source: To configure a UserTrackingLocation, you must set either <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.ArgumentTypeName%2A> or <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.ArgumentType%2A> to specify the type of the user data to be matched and either <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.ActivityTypeName%2A> or <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.ActivityType%2A> to specify the type of the activity from which the user data must be emitted to be matched.
trans-unit.target: UserTrackingLocation를 구성 하려면 설정 해야 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.ArgumentTypeName%2A>또는 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.ArgumentType%2A>하나 및 일치 시킬 사용자 데이터의 형식을 지정할 수 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.ActivityTypeName%2A>또는 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.ActivityType%2A>있는 사용자 데이터를 내보내야 일치 시킬 활동의 종류를 지정할 수 있습니다.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.ActivityType%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.ActivityTypeName%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.ArgumentType%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.ArgumentTypeName%2A>

trans-unit.source: You may add <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingCondition> objects to <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.Conditions%2A> to more completely qualify the activity from which the user data must be emitted.
trans-unit.target: 추가할 수 있습니다 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingCondition>개체를 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.Conditions%2A>보다 완전 하 게 사용자 데이터 내보내야 하는 활동을 정규화 하.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.Conditions%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingCondition>

trans-unit.source: You may set <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.MatchDerivedArgumentTypes%2A> to specify that user data derived from the user data type specified by <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.ArgumentTypeName%2A> or <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.ArgumentType%2A> should be matched, and you may set <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.MatchDerivedActivityTypes%2A> to specify that user data emitted from activities derived from the activity type specified by <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.ActivityTypeName%2A> or <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.ActivityType%2A> should be matched.
trans-unit.target: 설정할 수 있습니다 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.MatchDerivedArgumentTypes%2A>로 지정 된 사용자 데이터 형식에서 파생 된 사용자 데이터를 지정 하려면 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.ArgumentTypeName%2A>또는 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.ArgumentType%2A>일치 해야 합니다. 설정할 수 있습니다 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.MatchDerivedActivityTypes%2A>하 여 지정 된 활동 형식에서 파생 된 활동에서 내보낸 사용자 데이터를 지정 하려면 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.ActivityTypeName%2A>또는 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.ActivityType%2A>일치 해야 합니다..</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.ActivityType%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.ActivityTypeName%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.MatchDerivedActivityTypes%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.ArgumentType%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.ArgumentTypeName%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.MatchDerivedArgumentTypes%2A>

trans-unit.source: You may set <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.KeyName%2A> to specify that only user data associated with the specified key name should be matched for this UserTrackingLocation.
trans-unit.target: 설정할 수 있습니다 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.KeyName%2A>사용자 지정 하려면 지정 된 키 이름과 연결 된 데이터는이 UserTrackingLocation에 대 한 일치 해야 합니다.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.KeyName%2A>

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.KeyName%2A> is a null reference (`Nothing` in Visual Basic), the runtime tracking structure will not try to match the key associated with the user data.
trans-unit.target: 경우 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.KeyName%2A>가 null 참조 (`Nothing` Visual basic에서), 사용자 데이터와 연결 된 키와 일치 하도록 런타임 추적 구조를 시도 하지 것입니다.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.KeyName%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 새 인스턴스를 초기화는 <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation"> </xref> 클래스입니다.

trans-unit.source: The default constructor initializes an empty <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation>.
trans-unit.target: 기본 생성자는 빈을 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation>.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation> 를 초기화합니다.

trans-unit.source: You must specify both the type of the user data to match and the type of the activity from which it must be emitted in order to be matched.
trans-unit.target: 일치 시킬 사용자 데이터의 형식과 일치 하기 위해 발생 해야 하는 작업의 유형을 지정 해야 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Therefore, to configure the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation> you must explicitly set either <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.ActivityTypeName%2A> or <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.ActivityType%2A> to specify the type of an activity from which user data must be emitted to be matched, and you must also explicitly set either <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.ArgumentTypeName%2A> or <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.ArgumentType%2A> to specify the type of the user data to be matched.
trans-unit.target: 따라서 구성 하는 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation>명시적으로 설정 해야 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.ActivityTypeName%2A>또는 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.ActivityType%2A>설정를 일치 시킬 사용자 데이터를 내보내야 하 고 명시적으로 해야 하는 활동의 유형을 지정 하 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.ArgumentTypeName%2A>또는 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.ArgumentType%2A>일치 시킬 사용자 데이터의 형식을 지정 하려면.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.ArgumentType%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.ArgumentTypeName%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.ActivityType%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.ActivityTypeName%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation>

trans-unit.source: You may further configure the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation> by setting its other properties.
trans-unit.target: 추가로 구성할 수 있습니다는 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation>기타 속성을 설정 하 여.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation"></xref> class by using the unqualified name of the common language runtime (CLR) type of the user data.
trans-unit.target: 새 인스턴스를 초기화는 <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation"> </xref> 사용자 데이터의 공용 언어 런타임 (CLR) 형식의 정규화 되지 않은 이름을 사용 하 여 클래스입니다.

trans-unit.source: This constructor initializes a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation> that matches user data of the specified type emitted from the workflow.
trans-unit.target: 이 생성자는 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation>는 워크플로에서 내보낸 지정 된 형식의 사용자 데이터와 일치 하는.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation>

trans-unit.source: You must specify the unqualified name of the <xref:System.Type> of the user data to be matched for `argumentTypeName`.
trans-unit.target: 정규화 되지 않은 이름을 지정 해야 합니다는 <xref:System.Type>에 대해 일치 시킬 사용자 데이터의 `argumentTypeName`.</xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: You must explicitly set either <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.ActivityType%2A> or <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.ActivityTypeName%2A> in your code to properly configure the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation>.
trans-unit.target: 중 하나 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.ActivityType%2A>또는 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.ActivityTypeName%2A> <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation>.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation> 올바르게 구성 하려면 코드에서</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.ActivityTypeName%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.ActivityType%2A> 명시적으로 설정 해야 합니다.

trans-unit.source: You may further qualify the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation> by setting its other properties.
trans-unit.target: 추가로 정규화 할 수 있습니다는 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation>기타 속성을 설정 하 여.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation>

trans-unit.source: The unqualified name of the CLR type of the user data to be matched.
trans-unit.target: 일치 시킬 사용자 데이터 CLR 형식의 정규화 되지 않은 이름입니다.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation"></xref> class using the common language runtime (CLR) type of the user data.
trans-unit.target: 새 인스턴스를 초기화는 <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation"> </xref> 클래스 사용자 데이터의 공용 언어 런타임 (CLR) 형식을 사용 합니다.

trans-unit.source: This constructor initializes a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation> that matches user data of the specified type emitted from the workflow.
trans-unit.target: 이 생성자는 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation>는 워크플로에서 내보낸 지정 된 형식의 사용자 데이터와 일치 하는.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation>

trans-unit.source: You must explicitly set either <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.ActivityType%2A> or <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.ActivityTypeName%2A> in your code to properly configure the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation>.
trans-unit.target: 중 하나 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.ActivityType%2A>또는 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.ActivityTypeName%2A> <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation>.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation> 올바르게 구성 하려면 코드에서</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.ActivityTypeName%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.ActivityType%2A> 명시적으로 설정 해야 합니다.

trans-unit.source: You may further qualify the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation> by setting its other properties.
trans-unit.target: 추가로 정규화 할 수 있습니다는 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation>기타 속성을 설정 하 여.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Type> of the user data to be matched.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Type>일치 시킬 사용자 데이터의.</xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation"></xref> class by using the unqualified name of the common language runtime (CLR) type of the user data and the unqualified name of the CLR type of the activity from which the user data must be emitted.
trans-unit.target: 새 인스턴스를 초기화는 <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation"> </xref> 사용자 데이터의 공용 언어 런타임 (CLR) 형식 및 사용자 데이터 내보내야 하는 활동의 CLR 형식의 정규화 되지 않은 이름을 정규화 되지 않은 이름을 사용 하 여 클래스입니다.

trans-unit.source: This constructor initializes a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation> that matches all user data of the specified type emitted from activities of the specified type.
trans-unit.target: 이 생성자는 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation>지정 된 형식의 활동에서 내보낸 지정 된 형식의 모든 사용자 데이터를 일치 하는.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation>

trans-unit.source: You must specify the unqualified name of the <xref:System.Type> of the activity and of the user data.
trans-unit.target: 정규화 되지 않은 이름을 지정 해야 합니다는 <xref:System.Type>활동 및 사용자 데이터.</xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: For example the unqualified name of the <xref:System.Type> of a <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.CodeActivity> activity is "Code".
trans-unit.target: 예를 들어의 정규화 되지 않은 이름을 <xref:System.Type>의 <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.CodeActivity>활동 "Code"입니다.</xref:System.Workflow.Activities.CodeActivity> </xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: You may further qualify the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation> by setting its other properties.
trans-unit.target: 추가로 정규화 할 수 있습니다는 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation>기타 속성을 설정 하 여.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation>

trans-unit.source: The unqualified name of the CLR type of the user data to be matched.
trans-unit.target: 일치 시킬 사용자 데이터 CLR 형식의 정규화 되지 않은 이름입니다.

trans-unit.source: The unqualified name of the CLR type of the activity from which the user data must be emitted.
trans-unit.target: 사용자 데이터 내보내야 하는 활동의 CLR 형식의 정규화 되지 않은 이름입니다.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation"></xref> class by using the unqualified name of the common language runtime (CLR) type of the user data and the CLR type of the activity from which the user data must be emitted.
trans-unit.target: 새 인스턴스를 초기화는 <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation"> </xref> 사용자 데이터의 공용 언어 런타임 (CLR) 형식 및 사용자 데이터 내보내야 하는 활동의 CLR 형식의 정규화 되지 않은 이름을 사용 하 여 클래스입니다.

trans-unit.source: This constructor initializes a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation> that matches all user data of the specified type emitted from activities of the specified type.

trans-unit.source: You must specify the unqualified name of the <xref:System.Type> of the user data.
trans-unit.target: 정규화 되지 않은 이름을 지정 해야 합니다는 <xref:System.Type>사용자 데이터.</xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: You may further qualify the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation> by setting its other properties.

trans-unit.source: The unqualified name of the CLR type of the user data to be matched.
trans-unit.target: 일치 시킬 사용자 데이터 CLR 형식의 정규화 되지 않은 이름입니다.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Type> of the activity from which the user data must be emitted.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Type>사용자 데이터 내보내야 하는 활동의.</xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation"></xref> class by using the common language runtime (CLR) type of the user data and unqualified name of the CLR type of the activity from which the user data must be emitted.
trans-unit.target: 새 인스턴스를 초기화는 <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation"> </xref> 사용자 데이터 및 사용자 데이터 내보내야 하는 활동의 CLR 형식의 정규화 되지 않은 이름을의 공용 언어 런타임 (CLR) 형식을 사용 하 여 클래스입니다.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Type> of the user data to be matched.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation"></xref> class by using the common language runtime (CLR) type of the user data and the CLR type of the activity from which the user data must be emitted.
trans-unit.target: 새 인스턴스를 초기화는 <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation"> </xref> 사용자 데이터의 공용 언어 런타임 (CLR) 형식 및 사용자 데이터 내보내야 하는 활동의 CLR 형식을 사용 하 여 클래스입니다.

trans-unit.source: This constructor initializes a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation> that matches all user data of the specified type emitted from activities of the specified type.
trans-unit.target: 이 생성자는 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation>지정 된 형식의 활동에서 내보낸 지정 된 형식의 모든 사용자 데이터를 일치 하는.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation>

trans-unit.source: You may further qualify the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation> by setting its other properties.
trans-unit.target: 추가로 정규화 할 수 있습니다는 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation>기타 속성을 설정 하 여.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Type> of the user data to be matched.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Type>일치 시킬 사용자 데이터의.</xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Type> of the activity from which the user data must be emitted.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Type>사용자 데이터 내보내야 하는 활동의.</xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the common language runtime (CLR) type of the activity from which the user data must be emitted to be tracked.
trans-unit.target: 있는 사용자 데이터를 내보내야를 추적 하는 활동의 공용 언어 런타임 (CLR) 형식을 가져오거나 설정 합니다.

trans-unit.source: If you want to specify the type of the activity in a version-independent manner, use <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.ActivityTypeName%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 버전에 관계 없이 활동 형식을 지정 하려는 경우 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.ActivityTypeName%2A>.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.ActivityTypeName%2A> 사용

trans-unit.source: You must specify either ActivityType or <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.ActivityTypeName%2A> to properly configure the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation>.
trans-unit.target: ActivityType 또는 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.ActivityTypeName%2A> <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation>.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation> 올바르게 구성 하려면</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.ActivityTypeName%2A> 을 지정 해야 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Type> of the activity from which the data must be emitted.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Type>데이터 내보내야 하는 활동의.</xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the unqualified name of the common language runtime (CLR) type of the activity from which the user data must be emitted to be tracked.
trans-unit.target: 사용자 데이터를 내보내야를 추적 하는 활동의 공용 언어 런타임 (CLR) 형식의 정규화 되지 않은 이름을 가져오거나 설정 합니다.

trans-unit.source: You must specify the unqualified name of the type of the activity.
trans-unit.target: 활동 형식의 정규화 되지 않은 이름을 지정 해야 합니다.

trans-unit.source: For example, to specify the unqualified name of a <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.CodeActivity> activity, set ActivityTypeName to "Code".
trans-unit.target: 예를 들어, 정규화 되지 않은 이름을 지정 하는 <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.CodeActivity>활동, ActivityTypeName을 "Code"로 설정 합니다.</xref:System.Workflow.Activities.CodeActivity>

trans-unit.source: ActivityTypeName provides a much easier way to specify the type of the activity that emits the user data when you author a profile directly in XML.
trans-unit.target: ActivityTypeName를 XML로 직접 프로필을 작성할 때 사용자 데이터를 내보내는 활동 형식을 지정 하는 보다 편리한 방법을 제공 합니다.

trans-unit.source: ActivityTypeName also provides a version-independent way of referring to the type of the activity.
trans-unit.target: ActivityTypeName는 또한 활동의 형식을 참조 하는 버전에 관계 없이 방법을 제공 합니다.

trans-unit.source: You must specify either ActivityTypeName or <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.ActivityType%2A> to properly configure the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation>.
trans-unit.target: ActivityTypeName 또는 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.ActivityType%2A> <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation>.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation> 올바르게 구성 하려면</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.ActivityType%2A> 를 지정 해야

trans-unit.source: The unqualified name of the <xref:System.Type> of the activity from which the data must be emitted.
trans-unit.target: 정규화 되지 않은 이름을 <xref:System.Type>데이터 내보내야 하는 활동의.</xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the common language runtime (CLR) type of the user data to be tracked.
trans-unit.target: 추적할 사용자 데이터의 공용 언어 런타임 (CLR) 형식을 가져오거나 설정 합니다.

trans-unit.source: If you want to specify the type of the user data in a version-independent manner, use <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.ArgumentTypeName%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 버전에 관계 없이 사용자 데이터의 형식을 지정 하려는 경우 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.ArgumentTypeName%2A>.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.ArgumentTypeName%2A> 사용

trans-unit.source: You must specify either ArgumentType or <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.ArgumentTypeName%2A> to properly configure the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation>.
trans-unit.target: ArgumentType 또는 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.ArgumentTypeName%2A> <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation>.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation> 올바르게 구성 하려면</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.ArgumentTypeName%2A> 을 지정 해야 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Type> of the user data to be tracked.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Type>의 사용자 데이터를 추적할 수 있습니다.</xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the unqualified name of the common language runtime (CLR) type of the user data to be tracked.
trans-unit.target: 추적할 사용자 데이터의 공용 언어 런타임 (CLR) 형식의 정규화 되지 않은 이름을 가져오거나 설정 합니다.

trans-unit.source: ArgumentTypeName provides a much easier way to specify the type of the user data when you author a profile directly in XML.
trans-unit.target: ArgumentTypeName는 XML로 직접 프로필을 작성할 때 사용자 데이터의 형식을 지정 하는 보다 편리한 방법을 제공 합니다.

trans-unit.source: ArgumentTypeName also provides a version-independent way of referring to the type of the user data.
trans-unit.target: ArgumentTypeName는 또한 사용자 데이터의 형식을 참조 하는 버전에 관계 없이 방법을 제공 합니다.

trans-unit.source: You must specify either ArgumentTypeName or <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.ArgumentType%2A> to properly configure the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation>.
trans-unit.target: ArgumentTypeName 또는 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.ArgumentType%2A> <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation>.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation> 올바르게 구성 하려면</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.ArgumentType%2A> 를 지정 해야

trans-unit.source: The unqualified name of the <xref:System.Type> of the user data.
trans-unit.target: 정규화 되지 않은 이름을 <xref:System.Type>사용자 데이터.</xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: Gets a collection of conditions that are used to qualify the activity from which the user data must be emitted to be tracked.
trans-unit.target: 사용자 데이터를 내보내야를 추적 하는 활동 정규화에 사용 되는 조건 컬렉션을을 가져옵니다.

trans-unit.source: You can use Conditions to more precisely define the instance of the activity type specified by <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.ActivityTypeName%2A> or <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.ActivityType%2A> from which the user event must be emitted to match the tracking location.
trans-unit.target: 조건을 사용 하 여 보다 정확 하 게 하 여 지정 된 활동 형식의 인스턴스를 정의 하려면 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.ActivityTypeName%2A>또는 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.ActivityType%2A>있는 사용자 이벤트 내보내야 하 여 추적 위치를 일치에서.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.ActivityType%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.ActivityTypeName%2A>

trans-unit.source: For example, if you want to match only <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.CodeActivity> activities with an <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity.Name%2A> equal to "MyCode", you can set <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.ActivityTypeName%2A> to "Code" and add an <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingCondition> to Conditions that specifies that the ID property of the activity instance must be equal to "MyCode".
trans-unit.target: 예를 들어, 일치 시키려면 <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.CodeActivity>사용 하 여 활동은 <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity.Name%2A>"MyCode" 같음, 설정할 수 있습니다 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.ActivityTypeName%2A>을 "Code"로 추가 하 고는 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingCondition>활동 인스턴스의 ID 속성이 "MyCode" 크거나 같아야 함을 지정 하는 상황.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingCondition> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.ActivityTypeName%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity.Name%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.Activities.CodeActivity>

trans-unit.source: Every <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingCondition> in Conditions must be true for the activity to be matched.
trans-unit.target: 모든 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingCondition>조건이 충족 되어야 일치 시킬 활동에 대 한.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingCondition>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingConditionCollection"></xref> that is used to qualify the activity from which the user data must be emitted.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingConditionCollection"> </xref> 사용자 데이터 내보내야 하는 활동 정규화 하는 데 사용 되는 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Get or sets the name with which the user data must be associated for the <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation"></xref> to be matched.
trans-unit.target: 가져오기 이름을 하거나 설정 된 사용자 데이터에 대 한 연결 되어야 합니다는 <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation"> </xref> 일치할 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: An activity designer or a workflow designer can use either <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity.TrackData%28System.String%2CSystem.Object%29?displayProperty=fullName> or <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionContext.TrackData%28System.String%2CSystem.Object%29?displayProperty=fullName> to associate a string key with the user data that is emitted in a user event.
trans-unit.target: 활동 디자이너나 워크플로 디자이너를 사용할 수 <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity.TrackData%28System.String%2CSystem.Object%29?displayProperty=fullName>또는 <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionContext.TrackData%28System.String%2CSystem.Object%29?displayProperty=fullName>문자열 키를 사용자 이벤트에 내보낼 사용자 데이터와 연결할.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionContext.TrackData%28System.String%2CSystem.Object%29?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity.TrackData%28System.String%2CSystem.Object%29?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: If KeyName is not a null reference (`Nothing`), the key associated with the user data must match the value of KeyName for the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation> to be matched.
trans-unit.target: KeyName이 null 참조 (`Nothing`), 사용자 데이터와 연결 된 키에 대 한 KeyName 값과 일치 해야 합니다는 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation>일치 시킬.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation>

trans-unit.source: If KeyName is a null reference (`Nothing`), the runtime tracking infrastructure does not check for a matching key to determine whether the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation> is matched.
trans-unit.target: KeyName이 null 참조 (`Nothing`) 런타임 추적 인프라의 일치 하는 키를 확인 하는 확인 하지 않습니다 여부는 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation>일치 합니다.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation>

trans-unit.source: A <xref uid="langword_csharp_string" name="string" href=""></xref> key with which the user data must be associated for the <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation"></xref> to be matched or a null reference (<xref uid="langword_csharp_Nothing" name="Nothing" href=""></xref> in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: A <xref uid="langword_csharp_string" name="string" href=""> </xref> 키나 사용자 데이터를 연결 해야는 <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation"> </xref> 일치 시킬 이거나 null 참조 (<xref uid="langword_csharp_Nothing" name="Nothing" href=""> </xref> Visual basic에서).

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the user data should be tracked when it is emitted from activities derived from the activity type specified by <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.ActivityType*> or <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.ActivityTypeName*>.
trans-unit.target: 사용자 데이터 추적할지 여부 내보낼 때 지정 된 활동 형식에서 파생 된 활동에서 나타내는 값을 가져오거나 설정 합니다. <> </> *> 또는 <> </> *> 합니다.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the user data should be tracked when it is emitted from activities derived from the type specified by <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.ActivityType*> or <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.ActivityTypeName*>; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>지정 된 형식에서 파생 된 활동에서 내보낼 때 사용자 데이터를 추적 해야 하면 <> </> *> 또는 <> </> *> 고, 그렇지 않으면, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 기본값은 <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: The User tracking location is a way to filter user tracked data.
trans-unit.target: 사용자 추적 위치는 사용자 추적 데이터를 필터링 하는 방법입니다.

trans-unit.source: The user can filter by the type of the user tracked data by specifying the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.ArgumentType*> or <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.ArgumentTypeName*>.
trans-unit.target: 사용자 지정 하 여 사용자 추적 데이터의 형식으로 필터링 할 수는 <> </> *> 또는 <> </> *> 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Setting the <xref uid="langword_csharp_MatchDerrivedArgumentTypes" name="MatchDerrivedArgumentTypes" href=""></xref><xref uid="langword_csharp_Boolean" name="Boolean" href=""></xref> value to <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> specifies that the user tracked data can be of type ArgumentType/ArgumentTypeName or a type derived from the ArgumentType/ArgumentTypeName.
trans-unit.target: 설정의 <xref uid="langword_csharp_MatchDerrivedArgumentTypes" name="MatchDerrivedArgumentTypes" href=""> </xref> <xref uid="langword_csharp_Boolean" name="Boolean" href=""> </xref> 값을 <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref> 사용자 추적 데이터 ArgumentType/ArgumentTypeName 유형일 수 있습니다 또는 ArgumentType/ArgumentTypeName에서 파생 된 형식을 지정 합니다.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if user data derived from the type of the user data specified by <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.ArgumentType*> or <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.ArgumentTypeName*> should be tracked; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>에 지정 된 사용자 데이터 형식에서 파생 된 사용자 데이터 <> </> *> 또는 <> </> *> 추적 된 건너뛸 필요가 없으면, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 기본값은 <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>합니다.
